dashboard.description-1: - Trade at the best price due to lowest copying time difference
dashboard.description-7: - Special bonuses from our partner exchanges

publicstrategies.title: Public strategies

publicstrategies.label: Name Your Connection
publicstrategies.disc: To subscribe this strategies you have to connect account first.

myStrategies.title: My Strategies
myStrategies.subtitle: Skilled traders can create strategies and earn on subscriptions. Learn more in our article: How to Trade on Coinmatics
myStrategies.keepinmindparagraph: Keep in mind that a secret key is only shown during the API key creation process. It will be hidden afterwards. Safely save it at this step to be able to use this API key later.
myStrategies.provideinformation-content: Provide information about the strategy: trading method / approach, trading term (short / medium / long), trading pair, coins traded, recommendations for investors, your trading experience, etc. This will help your potential subscribers learn more about your strategy. Make sure that you write a detailed and concise description of the strategy – otherwise, the strategy may not pass moderation.

myorder.title: My Orders
myorder.cancelInfo: Do you want to cancel this order

exchangeaccounts.title: Exchange Accounts
exchangeaccounts.modalDisc1: Don’t forget to enable two-factor authentication in the end of registration process. It’s a mandatory requirement for an API key creation.
exchangeaccounts.modalDisc2: To maximize copy trading effectiveness, we recommend using a subaccount dedicated to one particular strategy. You should not do any other trading activity on this subaccount.
exchangeaccounts.modalDisc3: Log in to your Bybit account. Go to Profile API Management page and click the 'Create API' button.
exchangeaccounts.modalDisc4: Select the “System generated API key” option. Enter your API key label and pass the Security verification.
exchangeaccounts.modalDisc5: Hit the ‘Edit restriction' button and select the following checkboxes:
exchangeaccounts.modalDisc6: Switch the ‘Restrict access to trusted IPs only’ radio button, return to Mksignal website tab and click the “Copy IP” button, enter them to the field on Bybit and click the “Confirm” button.
exchangeaccounts.modalDisc7: You should copy and enter the IP-addresses without any changes. If you do change, API Key will not work properly.
exchangeaccounts.modalDisc8: Please do not select 'Enable Withdrawals' for security reasons. Mksignal does not support API Keys with this permission.
exchangeaccounts.modalDisc9: Keep in mind that a secret key is only shown during the API key creation process. It will be hidden afterwards. Safely save it at this step to be able to use this API key later.
